title: Can't connec to the chat
body: Well, I did this little update of 17 Mb,but after that, i got chat connection issues. cant connect to chat. I tried everything but still can't onnect myself to it. Can someone help me please?{{summoner:21}}

replies.body:
Hey there, 

Same is happening to me. For the first time in 3 years, "Logging onto chat service" is stuck at the bottom of my client.

I've tried to restart the client, but it won't work any better. 
My ping is stable at 25, and my download rate is, as always, 200MB/s, so I'm pretty much sure it isn't a connection issue.

Im on OS X El Capitan, v.10.11.6.

What operating system are you using?  There was another player who had a similar issue after updating Windows 7, so I was curious. Regardless, your network might be having trouble establishing a connection to our chat server, but our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help you get things back in order.
